DzPropertySettings Class Reference
[Properties]

Base class for all property options. Property classes should use this to pass the options supported by the class. More...

#include <dzpropertysettings.h>

Inheritance diagram for DzPropertySettings:

List of all members.

Public Functions

 DzPropertySettings ()
 DzPropertySettings (const DzSettings *settings)
 ~DzPropertySettings ()

Detailed Description

Base class for all property options. Property classes should use this to pass the options supported by the class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Default Constructor - creates an empty set of options
